description: Initializes the JBoss cache system using configuration properties
Stops the JBoss cache service when no longer needed
Adds or updates an entry in the cache with a key and value
Adds an entry to the cache with a specific namespace (FQN) and key
Retrieves a cached entry by its key
Retrieves a cached entry using namespace (FQN) and key
Retrieves an entire cache namespace by its FQN
Retrieves all values stored within a specific cache namespace
Removes a specific entry from the cache by namespace and key
Removes an entire namespace and all its entries from the cache
